7b97d2b9-5482-4023-ba8b-5ea333da59e7.description: The Certified Lean Six Sigma Green Belt is an individual that possesses a thorough understanding of enhanced problem-solving skills, with an emphasis on the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve and Control) model. The Green Belt Certification designation also reflects the knowledge by the individual to serve as a trained team member within his or her function-specific area of the organization. This focus allows the Green Belt to work on small, carefully defined Six Sigma projects.
7b97d2b9-5482-4023-ba8b-5ea333da59e7.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma GreenBelt

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The Certified Six Sigma Green Belt is an individual that possesses a thorough understanding of enhanced problem-solving skills, with an emphasis on the DMAIC (Define, Measure, Analyze, Improve and Control) model. The Green Belt Certification designation also reflects the knowledge by the individual to serve as a trained team member within his or her function-specific area of the organization. This focus allows the Green Belt to work on small, carefully defined Six Sigma projects.

8fb1c3f4-1339-43ee-8a4b-fcdd866d5c6e.description: A Certified Six Sigma Yellow Belt is an individual who has attained a basic knowledge of Six Sigma, but does not lead projects on their own. They are often responsible for the development of process maps to support Six Sigma projects. A Yellow Belt participates as a core team member or subject matter expert (SME) on a project or projects. In addition, Yellow Belts may often be responsible for running smaller process improvement projects using the PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Act) methodology.
8fb1c3f4-1339-43ee-8a4b-fcdd866d5c6e.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma YellowBelt

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Certified Six Sigma Yellow Belt is an individual who has attained a basic knowledge of Six Sigma, but does not lead projects on their own. They are often responsible for the development of process maps to support Six Sigma projects. A Yellow Belt participates as a core team member or subject matter expert (SME) on a project or projects. In addition, Yellow Belts may often be responsible for running smaller process improvement projects using the PDCA (Plan, Do, Check, Act) methodology.

442ea11d-5c90-4b00-b975-8862a7f6081f.description: The Agile project management philosophy focuses more on team collaboration and less on hierarchical leadership. Agile Professionals work through distributing the responsibilities of the traditional project manager role among the team, with an appointed Scrum master serving as their guide and facilitator.
442ea11d-5c90-4b00-b975-8862a7f6081f.name: The Agile Project Manager

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Ultimately, an Agile project manager embraces the four key values of the methodology listed in the official Agile manifesto: 1)Individuals and interactions over processes and tools 2) Working software over comprehensive documentation 3) Customer collaboration over contract negotiation 4) Responding to change over following a plan

adc5a228-e56d-4345-8f65-5ff36f8373ab.description: The Certified Project Manger Program is designed to fully develop individuals into the realm of project management. With Projects that are designed to enhance and engage a culture of process improvement.
adc5a228-e56d-4345-8f65-5ff36f8373ab.name: Certified Project Manager

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Plan and Develop the Project Idea Monitor Project Progress and Set Deadlines Solve Issues That Arise Manage the Money Ensure Stakeholder Satisfaction Evaluate Project Performance

skills.name: Agile And Lean Project Leadership Methodologies

93b5b01c-fbf2-4ca1-b39c-0c53f9a15ee0.description: Professionals that receive this prestigious credential are fully prepared for the professional title of Scrum Master. A Scrum Master is the Scrum Team member tasked with fostering an effective and productive working environment and guiding others to understand Scrum values, principles and practices. Scrum Masters tend to be people-oriented, have a high level of emotional intelligence, and find joy in helping team members to grow.
93b5b01c-fbf2-4ca1-b39c-0c53f9a15ee0.name: Agile Scrum Master

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: Individuals that receive this credential are Scrum Masters. They are well versed in the Agile methodology. Promoting the 5 pillars of the Scrum Values, Courage, Focus, Commitment, Respect, and Openness. Scrum Masters can manage teams in the Agile Scrum Methodology.

skills.name: Ability To Participate Professionally In Scrum Projects
Accessing the Business Value of Scrum
Actively Participate In Scrum Events To Achieve Their Purpose
Agile Scrum - Planning And Managing The Sprint

5fe001b2-6516-45a1-b975-bd53956c571e.description: The Intermediate Excel Professional® is a specialization program designed for those who want to develop fundamental knowledge of Microsoft Excel. In taking this program, this professional added a highly valuable asset to their employability portfolio. Star 6 Sigma Global Academy is proud to award this individual as a Intermediate Excel Professional®.
5fe001b2-6516-45a1-b975-bd53956c571e.name: Intermediate Excel Professional®

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: - Improve or achieve a company's goals by analyzing data - Calculate the budget for companies, departments, and projects - Record data by inputting entries and organizing them appropriately - Manage employee schedules depending on availabilities and dates - Manage project details by inputting dates and project progress

4c79be36-6a12-4342-a2dd-7e379e0ab86e.description: The Supply Chain Manager Credentialing Program is an introduction to the fascinating world of Supply Chain Management. When a professional completes this program, they will have a richer and comprehensive understanding of the complexities that companies are facing in today's global networked economy.
4c79be36-6a12-4342-a2dd-7e379e0ab86e.name: Supply Chain Manager (SCM)

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: • What is Operations and Supply Chain Management and why is it important? • What are the key functions within this field, and how do they interact with one another and the broader business? • What are the responsibilities and decisions that managers in each functional area think about? • How will disruptions in the Supply Chain impact the business world and our lives?

2c270833-f445-4441-89c6-a0662f3519e5.description: Partnering with the Veteran Crisis Line, Along with the Gary Sinise Foundation, we are committed to ending suicide for our American Heroes. Suicide is a major public health concern. In 2019, suicide was the 10th leading cause of death overall in the United States, claiming the lives of over 47,500 people. Suicide is complicated and tragic, but it is often preventable.
2c270833-f445-4441-89c6-a0662f3519e5.name: Suicide Prevention Awareness For 2022

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: There are at least 20 Veteran Suicides Every Day And that’s just the official number. We think the number is more likely 24-25 Veterans a day. That is over 9,000 former service members each year we are losing to Veteran suicides. And the rate of active-duty suicides has increased over the last five years. These men and women volunteered and fought for our freedom. They are not getting the services they need after returning home from war. We can and should do better by them.

They can assemble subject matter experts (SME’s) and effectively facilitate FMEA. 0ca5c853-6cd0-4197-ba7d-22a8f5c3802e.description: With a dynamic approach to leadership; The Certified DiSC® Leadership Manager can improve your organizational skills, by analyzing the different personality types in the workplace. The Certified DiSC® Leadership Manager gains tools used by more than one million people every year to help improve teamwork, communication, and productivity in the workplace.

ff46ceb3-dec1-4258-898e-c1dd3592ccc8.description: The Certified Technology Manager (CTM) program is based on a broad-based multi-subject exam with a technology management emphasis. The CTM Program has 5 subject assessment areas; Leadership/Self-Management; Process/Operations (Planning and Controlling); People (Supervision and Dynamic listening); Quality (Control, Statistics, Reliability); and assessing Risk (Business Risk Assessment Skills).
ff46ceb3-dec1-4258-898e-c1dd3592ccc8.name: Certified Technology Manager

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

2d5bb541-7a7e-4540-8816-b86659694757.description: This digital badge recognizes individuals who have demonstrated mastery in Agile Scrum methodology and practices, and possess the knowledge and skills to lead Agile Scrum teams effectively. Earners of this badge have completed a comprehensive training program that covers the principles and values of Agile, Scrum framework, Agile Scrum roles and responsibilities, Agile Scrum artifacts and events, Agile Scrum metrics and measurement, and Agile Scrum adoption and scaling.
2d5bb541-7a7e-4540-8816-b86659694757.name: Agile Scrum Master Digital Badge®

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

This including Scrum Master Best Practices in the Business and Industry Sector.

skills.name: Scrum Framework Mastery For Leading And Coaching Scrum Implementations Within The Organization

d7f3ee0e-2e84-433c-bb54-e3db41671b94.description: The Master Black Belt Lean Six Sigma (MBBLSS) certification is a mark of career excellence and aimed at individuals who possess exceptional expertise and knowledge of current industry practice. Master black belts have outstanding leadership ability, are innovative, and demonstrate a strong commitment to the practice and advancement of quality and improvement.
d7f3ee0e-2e84-433c-bb54-e3db41671b94.name: Certified Lean Six Sigma Master Blackbelt

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt course is designed to help students master the interpersonal and professional skills needed to mentor Black Belt leaders and lead enterprise-wide initiatives. Students will also be taught advanced experiment design methods and strategies for efficiently deploying Lean Six Sigma within an organization, and will review the relationship between the industry, customer and supplier.

skills.name: Basics of Hypothesis Testing and Tests for Means in Six Sigma
Lean Six Sigma, LSS, Black Belt, Lean, Six Sigma, DMAIC, Process Excellence

This program covers key topics such as project planning, scheduling, budgeting, risk management, communication, and leadership. Upon completion of the program, participants will have gained a comprehensive understanding of project management concepts and best practices, and will be able to apply them in a re
98edfbb1-2d23-4174-bb41-3f916729c8f2.name: New!!! Certified Project Manager Essentials®

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The Certified Project Manager Essentials® program is an interactive online course that equips individuals with the fundamental knowledge and skills needed to manage projects effectively. The course covers key topics such as project planning, scheduling, budgeting, risk management, communication, and leadership. Participants can engage in discussions, ask questions, and receive feedback from instructors and fellow learners. The program also includes assessments to measure progress of the learner.

b902bf8f-bf77-4659-8190-60dc8a5bc431.description: The Certified Project Manager Essentials® Certification allows employers to rest assure you are ready to tackle Project Management in the industry. Learn the foundations of project management and get the skills to kick-start your career in a fast-growing field. 8 hour Fully self-paced Online Module Course. With instructional videos. At the conclusion of the Course, you will take a 65-question exam.
b902bf8f-bf77-4659-8190-60dc8a5bc431.name: Certified Project Manager Essentials

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: 24 Hour Training Certification Course, with intermediate and advance tools of project management. There is a 65-question exam.

7b26387e-c897-44ff-b02c-c7f68c579649.description: The Lean Six Sigma White Belt digital badge is a symbol of accomplishment and recognition for individuals who have completed the introductory level Lean Six Sigma training program. This badge demonstrates a fundamental understanding of the Lean Six Sigma methodology and its tools and techniques, and indicates a commitment to process improvement and efficiency. The badge is a digital representation of the individual's achievement and can be shared on social media, online profiles, or in digital r
7b26387e-c897-44ff-b02c-c7f68c579649.name: Lean Six Sigma White Belt

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The Lean Six Sigma White Belt digital badge is awarded to individuals who have completed the introductory level Lean Six Sigma training program. It signifies a fundamental understanding of the Lean Six Sigma methodology and its tools and techniques, and serves as a way to showcase skills and expertise to potential employers or colleagues. The badge is issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy, a recognized provider of Lean Six Sigma training and education.

skills.name: Basic Understanding of the DMAIC Process
Understanding Muda (Process Waste) in the Workplace

3e809551-ec87-422a-b43d-4874b8fe568e.description: A Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt digital badge signifies an individual's proficiency in the foundational concepts of process improvement methodologies. It demonstrates that the holder has acquired knowledge of the principles of Lean and Six Sigma and can apply them to identify and solve problems, streamline processes, and reduce waste. This badge indicates that the holder has completed training in Lean Six Sigma methodologies and possesses a fundamental understanding of Lean Six Sigma.
3e809551-ec87-422a-b43d-4874b8fe568e.name: Lean Six Sigma Yellowbelt Digital Badge

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: The Star 6 Sigma Global Academy offers a comprehensive program for earning a Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt certification. To earn this badge, participants must complete the required coursework, pass an online exam, and demonstrate proficiency in applying Lean Six Sigma concepts to real-world projects. The program covers a range of topics, including process improvement methodologies, data analysis, project management, and quality control.

A Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt from Star 6 Sigma Global Academy can bring measurable benefits to an organization by identifying areas of waste, streamlining processes, making data-driven decisions, and improving customer satisfaction. They can lead cross-functional teams to implement process improvements, resulting in increased productivity, improved quality, and reduced costs, ultimately leading to increased profitability.

skills.name: as well as Understanding Non Value Added Time.
Detailed Value Stream Mapping- Takt Time
Knowledge of process improvement tools and techniques
Understanding of Lean and Six Sigma Methodologies

75b824ee-7827-4d86-9984-ef3fe5796c43.description: To earn this badge, the individual must complete 90 hours of training in Lean Six Sigma methodology, which includes topics such as statistical process control, process mapping, root cause analysis, and project management. In addition, the individual must complete a project that demonstrates their ability to apply these skills to solve a business problem or improve a process. The project must be approved by a certified Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt or equivalent.
75b824ee-7827-4d86-9984-ef3fe5796c43.name: New!!!! Certified Lean Six Sigma Blackbelt®

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: To earn this badge, the individual must complete a comprehensive live training program covering key Lean Six Sigma concepts and tools, including statistical process control, process mapping, root cause analysis, and project management. In addition, the individual must complete a Black Belt level project that demonstrates their ability to apply these skills to solve a complex business problem or improve a process. The project must be approved by a certified Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt.

A Black Belt assessment is a comprehensive evaluation of an individual's proficiency in Lean Six Sigma methodology and tools. It typically includes a review of completed projects, knowledge and application of statistical analysis techniques, leadership and facilitation skills, and project management capabilities. Successful completion of a Black Belt assessment demonstrates the individual's ability to drive significant improvements and deliver measurable results using Lean Six Sigma methodology.

skills.name: Ability to identify and quantify sources of variation in processes
Ability to lead and facilitate improvement projects using Lean Six Sigma methodology
Black belt Level Six Sigma Practictitioner
Familiarity with process mapping and flowcharting techniques
Knowledge of statistical tools and methods for analyzing data

2dc62728-b4f7-4ba2-825b-3e3b35f1eec5.description: A Scrum Coach is someone that has a bit of a broader perspective than the team focused Scrum Master. Typically, a Scrum Coach has been a Scrum Master and possibly a Product Owner as well in the past. They have experience far beyond a two-day training certification. Most coaches have had multiple years in each role to gain much needed experience and perspective.
2dc62728-b4f7-4ba2-825b-3e3b35f1eec5.name: Agile Scrum Coach

issuer.summary: issued by Star 6 Sigma Global Academy

badge_template_activities.title: An Agile Coach refers to all of the methodologies in the Agile world since the Agile Manifesto was signed. It encompasses XP, Scrum, Kanban, as well as many other methodologies. A Scrum Coach is an Agile Coach that can assist specifically with the Scrum framework. A Scrum Coach is typically a bit between an Agile Coach and a Scrum Master. They may not be well-versed in other Agile methodologies but are experts in Scrum and have in-depth knowledge of Scrum practices in real world settings.

skills.name: Leading And Coaching The Organization In Its Scrum Adoption
Scrum Framework Mastery For Leading And Coaching Scrum Implementations Within The Organization
